Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 15ft, Average Damage: 19 Piercing plus 9 Acid
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 15 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 20ft, Average Damage: 17 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Dragon can use its Frightful Presence.  It then makes 3 attacks, one with its bite and two with its claws
Other Actions.Action 2: Frightful Presence, Each creature that is aware of the Dragon must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the Dragon
Other Actions.Action 3: Acid Breath, The Dragon exhales acid in a line.  Each creature caught in the line takes an Average 67 Acid damage

Abilities.Ability 1: Amphibious, The Dragon can breath air and water
Abilities.Ability 2: Legendary Resistance, If the Dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead

Legendary Actions.Action 1: Detect, The Dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check
Legendary Actions.Action 2: Tail Attack, The Dragon makes a Tail attack
Legendary Actions.Action 3: Wing Attack, The Dragon beats its wings.  Nearby creatures make a Dexterity saving throw, failing they take an Average 15 Bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.  The Dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed

Lair Actions.Action 1: Pools of water that the Dragon can see surge outward in a grasping tide.  Nearby creatures must succeed a Strength saving throw or be pulled into the water and knocked prone
Lair Actions.Action 2: A cloud of swarming insects fills a sphere, swarming and attacking any creatures caught in the space
Lair Actions.Action 3: Magical darkness appears, filling a 15ft radius sphere.  Darkvision can not see through this darkness, and nonmagical light can not illuminate it
